Description: Fragment of Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Oval handle to sharp turn. Rectangular stamp. Clay near fine pink-buff; cream slip.
Curator's comments: Drawn by Petrie (Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 200, 19. Name Marsyas. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, AMPH MGR P.11647?
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0802)
